EmailTemplate.subject: ISM Rosinka Update 13th August
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear ISM Rosinka parents,
We hope you are all enjoying the sunshine and having a relaxing summer. All of us at ISM Rosinka are very much looking forward to seeing you at school soon!
We are writing to confirm that preparations for the school’s opening on Monday 1st September are proceeding according to plan. Enhancements to the facilities completed/currently in progress include the addition of a rubber sports surface to the playground, the installation of new climbing frames and other play equipment to the outdoor areas at both sites, and the new kitchen and dining room facilities.
We’re enormously excited about the progress that has been made and it’s a great relief for all concerned that we are now able to confirm a timely opening!
Staff arrivals begin this week so the main focus of our attention, in addition to completing the refurbishment, now turns to welcoming new colleagues to Moscow and providing academic staff induction.
Information about the uniform shop at ISM Rosinka
In the interests of a smooth start to the academic year, please make arrangements to purchase uniform before the first school day.
The shop will operate at the Upper School Campus from Monday, 18th August and will be open Monday-Friday from 9.00-16.00.
Please note that we currently do not have all items in stock. However, a comprehensive delivery will be made during the week of the 25th.
Therefore, the uniform shop will also be open from 9.00-16.00 on Saturday, 30th and Sunday, 31st August. All items will be available by then.
If you are a Rosinka resident (and are not making a special visit to the complex) then please come and peruse the items currently in stock from Monday 18th August.

Important: emails that you will receive
Please be aware that the following information will be emailed to you by Tuesday 19th August:
parent portal login information;
an insert for the standard ISM parent handbook (reflecting the conditions of the Krylatskoe campus), detailing how procedures and school events differ slightly for ISM Rosinka;
a class list, confirming the teaching team who will lead your child’s class and the names of students.
Forthcoming events
Please be aware of the following events planned for the period prior to the school’s opening:
General Information Presentation for ISM Rosinka Parents (for all ages), 15.00 at the Upper School Campus on Thursday 28th August (school hall)
Early Years Foundation Stage Induction Morning, 8.30 – 10.30 on Friday 29th August. [1]
We look forward to a busy but exciting start to the first academic year at ISM Rosinka!
Kind regards,
The Rosinka Team
[1] This is an opportunity for Pre-Nursery, Nursery and Reception children to meet their teachers and begin to adapt to the school environment. A further email will be sent only to pupils in the aforementioned year groups, detailing arrangements for morning.
